text: Iván Vitányi (3 July 1925 – 6 September 2021) was a Hungarian sociologist, essayist, dance historian, philosopher of art and politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of Hungary from 1990 to 2014. He was a member of the Hungarian Socialist Party and of the Hungarian Communist Party. He was born in Debrecen, Hungary. Vitányi died on 6 September 2021 in Budapest at the age of 96.Meghalt Vitányi Iván ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Hungarian writers Category:Hungarian philosophers Category:Essayists Category:Hungarian sociologists
title: Iván Vitányi
